description: Erection of rear dormer extension over existing outrigger in second floor  Installation of solar panels on rear flat roof.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings PR120 - Proposed Location Plan and Block Plan, PR101 - Proposed Ground Floor Plan, PR102 - Proposed First Floor Plan and PR103 - Proposed Second Floor Plan hereby approved and thereafter maintained.Reason: In the interests of Fire Safety and to ensure the safety of all building users in accordance with Policy D12 (Fire safety) of the London Plan 2021.

The solar panels hereby approved must not exceed the height of the ridge of the main roof unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: The solar panels have not been depicted on all of the drawings and the condition is necessary to ensure that the solar panels are installed in accordance with the details shown on the side elevation in order to minimise any impact on the character and appearance of the area, in accordance with Policy DM10 of the Kingston  Core Strategy (2012).
